tool_description: An api that provides the Roman numeral for a given number between 1 - 1000
name: Number-to-Numeral Converter
title: Number-to-Numeral Converter

api_list.name: Get Numeral
api_list.description: Send out a number, receive its numeral equivalent
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://number-to-numeral-converter.p.rapidapi.com/api/456"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "number-to-numeral-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://number-to-numeral-converter.p.rapidapi.com/api/{number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "number-to-numeral-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
